name: Classic Margherita
description: Traditional Margherita with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pepperoni, mozzarella, and tomato sauce on a thin crust.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and our signature Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and onions, dressed with olive oil and oregano.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake on a graham cracker crust with a fruit topping.
